basics.name: Zhuoran Fu (付卓然)
basics.summary: Computer Science undergraduate at the University of York, specializing in Software & Systems Engineering. Experienced in full-stack development, machine learning, and data science with a focus on building scalable solutions.

education.area: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
courses: Systems and Devices 2: Operating Systems, Security, and Networking
Intelligent Systems: Machine Learning and Optimisation (IMLO)

portfolio.name: Health Punch
portfolio.description: COVID-19 health check-in web application for daily health status and location tracking. Built with Vue.js, Element UI, Baidu Maps API, and Axios. Features include interactive location selection, responsive UI, RESTful API endpoints, and admin dashboard with advanced filtering.

portfolio.name: Escape University
portfolio.description: 2D campus-themed adventure game with tile-based maps, character animations, and interactive collectibles. Implemented dynamic lighting system, AI companion system with pathfinding algorithms, and cross-platform deployment for desktop and web platforms.

portfolio.name: QUACK?
portfolio.description: 2D maze-based game with modular multi-screen architecture. Features achievement system, persistent leaderboard with local JSON storage, event-driven gameplay, and automated builds with Gradle and unit testing (JUnit 5) with code coverage reporting.
